episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch02:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] found
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ] in a bit of a rut.
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] was feeling down in the dumps, when...

Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! What a
coincidence, running into you here!
You seem a bit sad. Did something happen?
(Respond honestly.)

I see... So you haven’t been winning many battles
recently, and that’s why you’re sad...
(Explain while avoiding eye contact.)

I see. So you’ve been losing battles, and that’s
made you sad...
Thank you for telling me what happened.
I know how painful a losing streak can be.

I’ve been in one myself. When you’re experiencing
a slump, it's hard to get out of it.
When that happens to me...
I try out all sorts of things!

I’ll test new combinations of Pokémon moves,
Abilities, and items... Once I get an idea, I
immediately give it a go!

That’s my method, at least. Why don’t you give
it a try?
That’s the spirit, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Keep on training as long as you’re alive! Let’s
get fired up!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] trained hard with
Kabu, and was able to get out of [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] rut.

I think you’ve got the hang of it now, from the
looks of it!

Hm? You want to know what you can do to thank
me?
Well... In that case...

Would you consider accompanying me for a bit of
rest and relaxation?

A few days later, [Name:PlayerNickname ] met
up with Kabu to relax and take a break.

OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Is there anything
you’d like to do, or a place you’d like to see?

(Say you’d like to visit some
hot springs.)

Hot springs? I wasn’t aware you liked that sort of
thing...

(Say you want to eat a
Hoenn specialty.)
A Hoenn specialty? That’s awful specific, but...
*chuckle* Oh, I get it.
You’re very kind, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I appreciate that! Now, let’s get to relaxing!

Kabu and [Name:PlayerNickname ] spent the
whole day together, and the time flew by.
What a fun day that was!
You’ve got your smile back, too. I’m so glad.
To tell you the truth...

The reason why I called out to you the other day
was because I’d heard you were having a rough
time.

Maybe I was being a nosy old man, but I thought
I’d try to cheer you up.
When I finally saw you for myself, though...

Well, you looked just the way I did back when I
was stuck in a rut.
I couldn’t let you carry on like that.

As a Gym Leader, I’m responsible for testing
challengers...

It pains me to see a Trainer give in to despair
just because they’ve been defeated.

Though it can be hard at times, I hope younger
Trainers like you can believe in their own potential
and keep on trying!

That’s why I was so relieved when I saw you
climb out of the rut you were in!

Everyone has the capacity to start over, no
matter when or where they choose to do it!

Never let despair distinguish the flames of your
determination!

If you ever feel overwhelmed or alone, don’t
hesitate to call on me!
I’ll give you a cheer that’ll fuel your fire!
